purpose: Provide AI agents with the ability to manage cryptocurrency transactions and wallet functionalities.
principle: Builds on blockchain technology to enable secure and efficient crypto wallet operations for AI systems.
reusability: Offers a modular API for integrating wallet functions into various AI agents, allowing seamless crypto transaction capabilities.
limitations: Currently supports limited cryptocurrency networks; requires integration with specific blockchain platforms.
name: agentkit
description: Every AI Agent deserves a wallet.
highlight: Empowers AI agents with cryptocurrency wallet capabilities.
